column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Lao says : " Blow on it .
#Text=" Poppy says : " Avatar Aang , it 's an honor to have you visit us .
#Text=" Lao says : " In your opinion , how much longer do think the war will last ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'd like to defeat the Fire Lord by the end of summer , but I ca n't do that without finding an earthbending teacher first .
#Text=" Lao says : " Well , Master Yu is the finest teacher in the land .
#Text=He 's been teaching Toph since she was little .
#Text=" Aang says : " Then she must be a great earthbender !
#Text=Probably good enough to teach someone else !
#Text=Ow !
#Text=" Yu says : " Toph is still learning the basics .
#Text=" Lao says : " Yes , and sadly , because of her blindness , I do n't think she will ever become a true master .
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh , I 'm sure she 's better than you think she is .
#Text=" Toph says : " What 's your problem ?!
#Text=" Aang says : " What 's your problem ?
#Text=" Poppy says : " Well , shall we move to the living room for dessert , then ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Good night , buddy .
#Text=" Toph says : " Relax .
#Text=Look , I 'm sorry about dinner .
#Text=Let 's call a truce , okay ?
#Text=Even though I was born blind , I 've never had a problem seeing .
#Text=I see with earthbending .
#Text=It 's kind of like seeing with my feet .
#Text=I feel the vibrations in the Earth , and I can see where everything is .
#Text=You , that tree ... even those ants .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's amazing .
#Text=" Toph says : " My parents do n't understand .
#Text=They 've always treated me like I was helpless .
#Text=" Aang says : " Is that why you became the Blind Bandit ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah .
#Text=" Aang says : " Then why stay here where you 're not happy ?
#Text=" Toph says : " They 're my parents .
#Text=Where else am I supposed to go ?
#Text=" Aang says : " You could come with us .
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah .
#Text=You guys get to go wherever you want .
#Text=No one telling you what to do , that 's the life .
#Text=It 's just not my life .
#Text=We 're being ambushed !
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " I think you kids owe me some money .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Whoever took Aang and Toph left this .
#Text=" Katara says : " " If you want to see your daughter again , bring five hundred gold pieces to the arena . "
#Text=It 's signed Xin Fu and The Boulder .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I ca n't believe it ... I have The Boulder 's autograph !
#Text=" Lao says : " Master Yu , I need you to help me get my daughter back .
#Text=" Katara says : " We 're going with you .
#Text=" Poppy says : " Poor Toph , she must be so scared ... " Toph says : " You think you 're so tough ?
#Text=Why do n't you come up here so I can snap that grin off your face ?
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " I 'm not smiling .
#Text=" Lao says : " Toph !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Here 's your money .
#Text=Now let them go .
#Text=" Katara says : " What about Aang ?
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " I think the Fire Nation will pay a hefty price for the Avatar .
#Text=Now , get out of my ring .
#Text=" Aang says : " Go , I 'll be okay .
#Text=" Katara says : " Toph , there 's too many of them .
#Text=We need an earthbender .
#Text=We need you !
#Text=" Lao says : " My daughter is blind .
#Text=She is blind and tiny and helpless and fragile .
#Text=She can not help you !
#Text=" Toph says : " Yes , I can .
#Text=" Toph says : " Let him go !
#Text=I beat you all before and I 'll do it again !
#Text=" The Boulder says : " The Boulder takes issue with that comment .
#Text=" Toph says : " Wait !
#Text=They 're mine .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hit it harder !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm trying !
#Text=" Yu says : " I never knew .
#Text=Your daughter 's amazing !
#Text=" Yu says : " She 's the greatest earthbender I 've ever seen .
#Text="
